## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 40,000 units                             |
| Rationale                         |  To account for potential demand fluctuations and ensure sufficient stock for the next 5 days. Utilizing multiple vendor order quantities (2 x 20,000 units) allows for flexibility and minimizes excess inventory. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | 10,000 units less than player's planned order. This adjustment minimizes the risk of overstocking while still ensuring adequate supply to meet demand. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     |  2.8 days                                |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   |  6.2 days                                |
| Comments                          |   This recommendation ensures sufficient stock while maximizing efficiency. The lead time and shelf life are also factored in, and multiple vendor order quantities are utilized to ensure optimal flexibility.  |
